author: Saberin C
description:
Alchemy, in Marie Lu’s adult debut Red City, is the art of transformation. In the novel, we learn that a drug known as Sand is used amongst alchemists to heighten their strengths, but also their weaknesses. The tagline of the book reads ‘power always has a price’, referring largely to the fact that the use […]

title: REVIEW: Red City by Marie Lu

author: Z.B. Steele
description:
Christopher Ruocchio—author of The Sun Eater series—sat with our team to discuss writing, catharsis, distinguishing sub-genres, video games, and, of course, Shadows Upon Time, the seventh and final novel of The Sun Eater series.  [GdM] Hey Christopher, thanks so much for doing this interview! While I’m already aware that you and the books are fantastic, […]

title: INTERVIEW: with author Christopher Ruocchio
